prod_desc: Charge Lance into battle against the gargoyles!
prod_long_desc:
Ride Lance into the village of Ghoulia and battle Grimroc the giant gargoyle! Prepare the buildable robot horse for some jousting action, and charge against the buildable Grimroc figure with its lightning tridents. The gothic village scene has lightning strike elements, a cobweb and a catapult that can fire lightning ball elements at Lance. Includes two minifigures.
Includes two minifigures: Lance and a gargoyle, plus a large buildable gargoyle figure, Grimroc.
Features Lance’s buildable robot horse with weapon holder and a shield holder, plus a gothic village scene with catapult shooter, lightning elements, cobweb and a shield holder.
Attach the lance to the robot horse and joust against the gargoyles!
Launch lightning balls from the catapult to fend off Lance.
Weapons include Lance's lance, Grimroc's two lightning tridents and the gargoyle's trident.
Also includes two shield holders.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 8-12
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents’ permission.
Scan shields for the NEXO Power Triple Trouble and Forbidden Power Malicious Melting, and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Combine with 70366 Battle Suit Lance, or any other suits in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit series.
Robot horse measures over 3” high, 4” long and 1” wide.
Grimroc stands over 5” tall.
Village section measures over 7” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
